title: Shaun O'Hara on the OBJ trade & Adam Carolla!
itunes:title: Shaun O'Hara on the OBJ trade & Adam Carolla!
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by Handsome Hank as this NFL free agency frenzy begins! Shek and Eddie Spaghetti gloat over their trip to SXSW without Hank (2:55) and they get into the AFC North now with Odell Beckham Jr and without Antonio Brown (5:05). Next up, Shaun O'Hara drops by Studio 66 to chat with Shek about the state of the New York Giants after trading away their superstar OBJ (15:22). The show continues with Shek and Hank making sure Spaghetti is alright after his Beckham trade-fueled Twitter meltdown (46:37). Finally, we wrap up the show with Shek kibitzing with his old pal Adam Carolla about his new stand-up special and why the game of football is actually very simple (56:06).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
